title: CDSMatches
description: The results of a CDS algorithm run on an EMImage or LMImage.

maskId.title: Maskid
maskId.description: Unique identifier of the target image.

maskPublishedName.title: Maskpublishedname
maskPublishedName.description: Published name for the contents of the target image.

maskLibraryName.title: Masklibraryname
maskLibraryName.description: Name of the image library containing the target image.

maskImageStack.title: Maskimagestack
maskImageStack.description: URL of the full LM image stack for the target image.

CDSMatch.title: CDSMatch
CDSMatch.description: A CDSMatch is a match generated by the CDS algorithm between an EMImage and a LMImage.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the matching image.

publishedName.title: Publishedname
publishedName.description: Published name for the contents of the matching image.

libraryName.title: Libraryname
libraryName.description: Name of the image library containing the matching image.

alignmentSpace.title: Alignmentspace
alignmentSpace.description: Alignment space to which the matching image was registered.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Gender of the sample represented in the matching image.

imageStack.title: Imagestack
imageStack.description: URL of the full LM image stack of the matching image.

mirrored.title: Mirrored
mirrored.description: Indicates whether the target image was found within a mirrored version of the matching image.

imageURL.title: Imageurl
imageURL.description: Path to a PNG version of the image, relative to imageryBaseURL in the config.json.

thumbnailURL.title: Thumbnailurl
thumbnailURL.description: Path of a PNG thumbnail of the image, relative to thumbnailsBaseURLs in the config.json.

searchablePNG.title: Searchablepng
searchablePNG.description: Path to a PNG version of the image that was actually matched. This is the same as imageURL if the image was not segmented or otherwise processed prior to searching.

normalizedScore.title: Normalizedscore
normalizedScore.description: Match score reported by the matching algorithm

matchingPixels.title: Matchingpixels
matchingPixels.description: Number of matching pixels reported by the CDS algorithm

slideCode.title: Slidecode
slideCode.description: Unique identifier for the sample that was imaged.

objective.title: Objective
objective.description: Magnification of the microscope objective used to imaged this image.

mountingProtocol.title: Mountingprotocol
mountingProtocol.description: Description of the protocol used to mount the sample for imaging.

anatomicalArea.title: Anatomicalarea
anatomicalArea.description: Anatomical area of the sample that was imaged.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Channel index within the full LM image stack.
